targets.expr:
sum by (name, component) (
    # --- 1. JVM HEAP (Smoothed) ---
    label_replace(
        (avg_over_time(jvm_memory_used_bytes{area="heap", instance=~".+"}[1m]) * on (instance) group_left(name) 
        (label_replace(docker_container_info{project=~"$project", service=~"$service", name=~"$container"}, "instance", "$1", "name", "(.*)"))),
        "component", "01_jvm_heap", "", ""
    )
    or
    # --- 2. ROCKSDB BLOCK CACHE ---
    label_replace(
        (rocksdb_shared_cache_block_cache_usage{instance=~".+"} * on (instance) group_left(name) 
        (label_replace(docker_container_info{project=~"$project", service=~"$service", name=~"$container"}, "instance", "$1", "name", "(.*)"))),
        "component", "02_rocksdb_cache", "", ""
    )
    or
    # --- 3. ROCKSDB INDEX/FILTER BLOCKS (The hidden 200MB!) ---
    label_replace(
        (sum by (instance) (kafka_stream_state_estimate_table_readers_mem{instance=~".+"}) * on (instance) group_left(name) 
        (label_replace(docker_container_info{project=~"$project", service=~"$service", name=~"$container"}, "instance", "$1", "name", "(.*)"))),
        "component", "03_rocksdb_index_filter", "", ""
    )
    or
    # --- 4. DIRECT BUFFERS & NON-HEAP ---
    label_replace(
        ((jvm_memory_used_bytes{area="nonheap"} or java_nio_buffer_pool_used_bytes{id="direct"})
        * on (instance) group_left(name) (label_replace(docker_container_info{project=~"$project", service=~"$service", name=~"$container"}, "instance", "$1", "name", "(.*)"))),
        "component", "04_jvm_nonheap_direct", "", ""
    )
    or
    # --- 5. UNMAPPED PAGE CACHE (The OS File Cache) ---
    label_replace(
        ((container_memory_cache{id=~"^[a-f0-9]{64}$"} - container_memory_mapped_file{id=~"^[a-f0-9]{64}$"})
        * on (id) group_left(name) docker_container_info{project=~"$project", service=~"$service", name=~"$container"}),
        "component", "05_page_cache_active", "", ""
    )
    or
    # --- 6. Thread Overhead Apx ---
    label_replace(
        (java_lang_threading_threadcount{} * 1048576) * on (instance) group_left(name) (label_replace(docker_container_info{project=~"$project", service=~"$service", name=~"$container"}, "instance", "$1", "name", "(.*)")),
        "component", 
        "06_thread_overhead_apx", 
        "", 
        ""
    )
    ##or
    # --- 06. NATIVE (Fragmentation / Unaccounted) ---
    #label_replace(
    #    (
    #        # Left Side: Total Resident Set (Physical RAM)
    #        (container_memory_rss{id=~"^[a-f0-9]{64}$"} * on (id) group_left(name) docker_container_info{project=~"$project", service=~"$service", name=~"$container"})
    #        - on (name)
    #        # Right Side: The sum of all JMX-reported parts
    #        # We use 'sum by (name)' to ensure we have a clean label to subtract against
    #        sum by (name) (
    #            (
    #                # Note the use of '0' as a fallback so the sum doesn't break if a metric is missing
    #                avg_over_time(jvm_memory_used_bytes{area="heap"}[1m]) or 
    #                jvm_memory_used_bytes{area="nonheap"} or 
    #                rocksdb_shared_cache_block_cache_usage or 
    #                kafka_stream_state_size_all_mem_tables or 
    #                kafka_stream_state_estimate_table_readers_mem or
    #                (java_lang_threading_threadcount * 1048576)
    #            ) * on (instance) group_left(name) (label_replace(docker_container_info{project=~"$project", service=~"$service", name=~"$container"}, "instance", "$1", "name", "(.*)"))
    #        )
    #    ),
    #    "component", "06_native_other", "", ""
    #)
)

sum by (instance) (
    rocksdb_shared_cache_block_cache_usage{instance=~".+", cache_id=~".+"} * on (instance) group_left() (label_replace(docker_container_info{project=~"$project", service=~"$service", name=~"$container"}, "instance", "$1", "name", "(.*)"))
    or
    kafka_stream_state_size_all_mem_tables{instance=~".+"} * on (instance) group_left() (label_replace(docker_container_info{project=~"$project", service=~"$service", name=~"$container"}, "instance", "$1", "name", "(.*)"))
    or
    kafka_stream_state_estimate_table_readers_mem{instance=~".+"} * on (instance) group_left() (label_replace(docker_container_info{project=~"$project", service=~"$service", name=~"$container"}, "instance", "$1", "name", "(.*)"))
    or
    jvm_memory_used_bytes{area="heap", instance=~".+"} * on (instance) group_left(name) (label_replace(docker_container_info{project=~"$project", service=~"$service", name=~"$container"}, "instance", "$1", "name", "(.*)"))
    or 
    jvm_memory_used_bytes{area="nonheap", instance=~".+"} * on (instance) group_left(name) (label_replace(docker_container_info{project=~"$project", service=~"$service", name=~"$container"}, "instance", "$1", "name", "(.*)"))
    or
    jvm_buffer_pool_used_bytes{pool="direct", instance=~".+"} * on (instance) group_left(name) (label_replace(docker_container_info{project=~"$project", service=~"$service", name=~"$container"}, "instance", "$1", "name", "(.*)"))
    or 
    jvm_buffer_pool_used_bytes{pool="mapped", instance=~".+"} * on (instance) group_left(name) (label_replace(docker_container_info{project=~"$project", service=~"$service", name=~"$container"}, "instance", "$1", "name", "(.*)"))
     or
    java_lang_threading_threadcount{instance=~".+"} * 1048576 * on (instance) group_left(name) (label_replace(docker_container_info{project=~"$project", service=~"$service", name=~"$container"}, "instance", "$1", "name", "(.*)"))
)
